channel.title: Looking For
channel.description:
ok so im pretty new to java coding, ive done simple tuts and practiced on a few sources with some simple things... but i dont feel that im getting anywhere.... so i would love to find a guide, a guide that concentrates on making 317 servers, that explains EVERYTHING in detail, from beginner stuff to expert stuff, i have a few friends that have showed me bits and bobs but i dont feel its enough, i wana learn what files contain what, and what strings and arrays are etc.... any suggestions would be appreciated guys.
thanks to you all <3

item.title: Looking For
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

well honestly just look for java coding c++ tutorials and explore, thats the only way u can learn is by doing it and geting used to it. fixing your mistakes will also help u learn.

a class is just something that does something ex. class 118 in my files is used to make slayer dood talk or class 2450 could be a item or a portal. etc.

whats in your files is what makes the game run ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For
item.dc:creator: @kyle2kylek kyle2kylek
item.description:
@kyle2kylek wrote:

Ive learned by learn and exploring… ive had to re do alot and ive tried till i got it right. its better to memorize something then just to keep opening a tutorial

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Explore the files, test stuff, take a look at how they work, still look for tutorials and you will learn. That’s how i learned

Read full topic
